ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Change to bard song mechanics on Test!
ygData.msgSnippet: take a tumpy tonic Faras 8) Any fans of that 70 s show ?  Well Red keeps calling his brother and his sun a Dumb A**. Couple episodes ago he s talkin about his
ygData.messageBody:
take a tumpy tonic Faras 8)

Any fans of "that 70's show"? Well Red keeps calling his brother and his
sun a Dumb A**.

Couple episodes ago he's talkin about his brother, nagging on and on that
he's Dumb, and he's also an A**. then they play this heavenly music like he
just got a brilliant idea... He's a Dumb A**. I dunno, every time i hear
about certain Verant Employees playing with bards, i think of that little
scene now

Minkin

If i offended anyone i appologize

-----Original Message-----
From: Mike.Roach@... [mailto:Mike.Roach@...]
Sent: October 31, 2000 3:35 PM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Change to bard song mechanics on Test!


ARRRGH. I take back what I said earlier, thank got they did not patch
today!

WHY must VI spend so much time screwing around with nerfing bards when so
much is still broken and ignored!?

I think I have had one too many Mountain Dews today, I feel my heart rate
increasing.

-Faras

-----Original Message-----
From: Cranfill, Wendy [mailto:Wendy_Cranfill@...]
Sent: Tuesday, October 31, 2000 2:33 PM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Change to bard song mechanics on Test!


Hmm maybe I read the thread wrong but it seemed like Absor was going to
seriously look into it? Dunno, maybe I'm an optimist. Not to say we
shouldn't raise a stink if in fact it happens cuz that would just plain
suck, specially for lev and invis ...
